name: ScorePal Plus
description:
ScorePal Plus has all the same functionality as the original, but no ads!

ScorePal Plus is a simple yet extremely functional app that will allow you to easily keep score when playing your favorite games with friends and family.

Tips:
1) Touch a player's score to bring up a simple calculator.
2) Drag a player's name up or down to change turn order.
4) Tap a player's name in order to edit their properties.
3) Change the value of the text field labeled "+/-" to easily increment or decrement a player's score.
4) Touch the Timer button to create a new timer for your game. Navigate back to the main display and you can pause or reset the timer.
5) Don't have time to finish your game? Tap the Options button and save your Scoreboard.
